revision.text:
'''Temporary battles''' refers to special battles in Pokéclicker where the player faces a trainer or Pokémon once to unlock other areas. Once the player wins, these battles become inaccessible. ==Kanto== *Note: Minimum attack is calculated without taking into consideration click attack or the Pokémon's type(s). You can see how much damage you do against a certain Pokémon by clicking on or scrolling over the "Pokémon attack" number below the battle screen. The [[Type Effectiveness]] page has more information on how type matchups are ruled in Pokéclicker. {| class="wikitable collapsible" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Requirement !! Location !! '''Temporary battles''' refers to special battles in Pokéclicker where the player faces a trainer or Pokémon once to unlock other areas. Once the player wins, these battles become inaccessible. ==Kanto== *Note: Minimum attack is calculated without taking into consideration click attack or the Pokémon's type(s). You can see how much damage you do against a certain Pokémon by clicking on or scrolling over the "Pokémon attack" number below the battle screen. The [[Type Effectiveness]] page has more information on how type matchups are ruled in Pokéclicker. {| class="wikitable collapsible" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Requirement !! Location !!
